text:
Lead Android Engineer | Maven Clinic (https://www.mavenclinic.com) | New York, NY (ONSITE)

Maven connects patients with vetted, highly-qualified healthcare practitioners via video, with appointments starting at less than the price of a co-pay. We've been live since April, and are a fast-growing company in an exploding space. Healthcare is finally in the midst of real change, and weâ€™re just at the beginning.

We're looking for our first Android engineer, who will be a technical leader on our team and get to own the platform (our tech team currently has 2 backend, one iOS, one front-end).

Learn more here: https://angel.co/maven-4/jobs/79046-lead-android-developer
